Package org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.service

Interface ApplicationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationServiceImpl
    public interface ApplicationService
    Application service to handle all things relating to applications.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearCache()
      Clears the cached applications.
      void deleteApplication​(String name)
      Removes application in the realm.
      Application getApplication​(String applicationName)
      Retrieves an application instance for the passed name.
      Set<String> getApplicationNames()
      Returns all the application names in a realm.
      Set<Application> getApplications()
      Returns all the applications in a realm.
      Set<String> getReferredResources​(String applicationTypeName)
      Returns referred resources for a realm.
      Application saveApplication​(Application application)
      Saves application data.
      Set<Application> search​(org.forgerock.util.query.QueryFilter<String> queryFilter)
      Returns the applications that matches the search criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplication

        Application getApplication​(String applicationName)
                    throws EntitlementException
        Retrieves an application instance for the passed name.
        Parameters:
        applicationName - the application name
        Returns:
        an application instance, null if the application doesn't exist
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - should some error occur during the application retrieval

      • search

        Set<Application> search​(org.forgerock.util.query.QueryFilter<String> queryFilter)
                 throws EntitlementException
        Returns the applications that matches the search criteria.
        Parameters:
        queryFilter - Query Filter
        Returns:
        applications in a realm satisfied by the query.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - should some error occur during the application retrieval

      • getApplicationNames

        Set<String> getApplicationNames()
                         throws EntitlementException
        Returns all the application names in a realm.
        Returns:
        application names in a realm.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - should some error occur during the application retrieval

      • getApplications

        Set<Application> getApplications()
                          throws EntitlementException
        Returns all the applications in a realm.
        Returns:
        applications in a realm.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - should some error occur during the application retrieval

      • deleteApplication

        void deleteApplication​(String name)
                throws EntitlementException
        Removes application in the realm.
        Parameters:
        name - Application Name.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - should some error occur during the application retrieval

      • saveApplication

        Application saveApplication​(Application application)
                     throws EntitlementException
        Saves application data.
        Parameters:
        application - Application object.
        Returns:
        The saved application, which will include any modifications to its fields.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - should some error occur during the application retrieval

      • clearCache

        void clearCache()
        Clears the cached applications. Must be called when notifications are received for changes to applications.

      • getReferredResources

        Set<String> getReferredResources​(String applicationTypeName)
                          throws EntitlementException
        Returns referred resources for a realm.
        Parameters:
        applicationTypeName - Application Type Name.
        Returns:
        referred resources for a realm.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if referred resources cannot be returned.
